overview: Billy Blanks brings you another ultra-effective cardio workout, but this time it's Live! Using the beautiful backdrop of Venice beach, California, Billy's troops demonstrate his signature moves, along with strength training using the new Billy Bands, to rev up your metabolism and lift your energy levels while sculpting your entire body. The sand, the surf, and BootCamp Live! equals a fun and effective workout with maximum results
title: Billy's Bootcamp: Cardio Bootcamp Live!
